articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: What are AI ‘world models,’ and why do they matter? - TechCrunch
articles.description: World models are the newest talk around town. But what are they, and what do they have to do with today's AI?
articles.content:
World models, also known as world simulators, are being touted by some as the next big thing in AI. 
AI pioneer Fei-Fei Li’s World Labs has raised $230 million to build “large world models,” and Dee… [+7382 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Bird flu jumps from birds to human in Louisiana; patient hospitalized - Ars Technica
articles.description: This is the first human case of bird flu in Louisiana.
